attributes.action: Millions of Brits have Lost Pensions—£31 Billion forgotten—Let’s Reclaim Them!
attributes.additional_details: Right now, £31 billion in lost pensions is just sitting there—some of it could be yours. On average, each lost pension is worth £9,470. Millions of Brits don’t know they’re missing money. Instead of letting it go to waste, Parliament must make it easy to reclaim what’s yours. A single system would stop pensions from getting lost in the first place. If no one claims them, that money should be used to reduce financial burdens on the rest of us—not left to gather dust. Sign now to demand action!
attributes.background: Create a central pensions dashboard so everyone can see all their pensions in one place. Establish a government body to track down and reunite people with their lost pensions. If no rightful owner/family can be found, use unclaimed pensions to reduce the cost of state pensions & social care for all.

rejection.details:
The pensions dashboard is currently being developed, more information is available here: https://www.pensionsdashboardsprogramme.org.uk/#useful-resources. 

If you would like to start another petition calling for a specific action in relation to the pensions dashboard, you are welcome to do so.
